mapper.sql: id, parent_id, name, code, icon, url, target, menu, status, create_time, description
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_permission ( id, parent_id, name, code, icon, url, target, menu, status, create_time, description ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parentId}, #{name}, #{code}, #{icon}, #{url}, #{target}, #{menu}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{description} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_permission SET parent_id = #{parentId}, name = #{name}, code = #{code}, icon = #{icon}, url = #{url}, target = #{target}, menu = #{menu}, status = #{status}, create_time = #{createTime}, description = #{description} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT t.* FROM t_permission t, t_role_permission p WHERE p.permission_id = t.id AND p.role_id = #{roleId}
